name: Operation: Wholespoon
description:
Year 1 - Second Term

This game was create for a university project. The criteria were, make a point and click game and it has to be made in Processing. We only had 2 weeks to make this. I am very proud of what we did in 2 weeks. 

  • Engineer: Luuk Schrijver
  • Artist: Liam van Asten
  • Designer: Max Wierda
  • Designer: Oebe Rademaker
  • Designer: Sander Dikkers
